ComicInfo.Summary:
Lilacs in February: A bald little girl, whose mother died at her birth, is blamed for the death by her father, until aliens come to retrieve her and replace the mother with a clone.
An Observation:: The Observers check up on Earth.
Act of Contrition: A police Lieutenant finds out his brother is a vampire.
No Penny-- No Paradise: Alexander the Great has no penny to pay for passage to the underworld.
ComicInfo.Title: Lilacs in February; An Observation:; Act of Contrition; No Penny-- No Paradise
